name: Reba McEntire's Sweet Potato Casserole (Potato Mixture)
author: Helen Kluesner
instructions:
You may substitue 6 fresh medium-size sweet potatoes, boiled and peeled
Preheat oven to 350Â°. In a large bowl, mash potatoes. Add remaining casserole ingredients and mix well. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole dish.
